snippet.title: 'Seriously injured' man missing
snippet.content: POLICE are appealing for help to find a man who they believe was seriously injured during a disturbance in Railway Estate on Sunday night. About 10.30pm police were called to a Second Street apartment following reports of a disturbance at the address. One man left the address prior to police arrival and officers believe the man may be seriously injured and in need of medical assistance. Anyone who may know of the injured man's whereabouts is urged to call police or QAS. Three men are currently assisting with inquiries. Investigations are continuing. Anyone with information can contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or if it's an emergency, dial 000.
